Data on Wells and Pump Irrigation

This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Data on Wells and Pump Irrigation 1904-1941

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Agricultural Extension Service

did.abstract: This cooperative project of the University of Arizona, College of Agriculture and the U.S. Dept. of Agriculture encouraged agriculture and home economics in Arizona. The collection includes records on printed forms; data on wells and pump irrigation for Townships 9-21, Pima County, Ariz., 1912-1941, including records of stream flow in Santa Cruz River, Rillito Creek, and Sabino Canyon, 1904-1935.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Data on Wells and Pump Irrigation (AZ 181). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cooperative project of the University of Arizona, College of Agriculture and the U.S. Dept. of Agriculture to encourage agriculture and home economics in Arizona.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by location; township, range, and section.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Records on printed forms; data on wells and pump irrigation for Townships 9-21, Pima County, Ariz., 1912- 1941, including records of stream flow in Santa Cruz River, Rillito Creek, and Sabino Canyon, 1904-1935.
